I bring structured execution, clear stakeholder communication, and a consistent focus on measurable impact. Regards, [Your Name]

  • Mapped Program management into weekly execution rhythm and progress reporting by program management professional delivering measurable impact and aligning outcomes to expectations at IBM, wi. Targeting Business Program Manager - Platform.

  • Mapped Stakeholder management into weekly execution rhythm and progress reporting by s at Smoke Systems. Focus areas: program management, cross-functional delivery, SQL, KPI tracking, stakeholder management. (SQL skills).
  • Drove Program management planning from scope definition to milestone tracking across product, engineering, and operations teams. (KPI tracking).
Experience

  • Owned roadmap execution for program increments spanning product, ops, and engineering teams.
